Room.Name: Dragon Tooth Inn Public Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the west side of the Dragon Tooth Inn in the public room.
Room.LongDescription: This is a nice, quiet little bar devoted to serious drinking. As long as you are not loud, you can get as drunk as you please in here. There are a number of officers from the city guard in here, each sitting alone and drinking at a steady rate. Must be something about the job, eh? The new owner of the Dragon Tooth Inn, a half-giant named Tharonwold, spends his time here serving drinks. He's been known to take one or two himself.
